Attributes.description: The differential geometry of curves and surfaces in three-dimensional Euclidean space. Mean curvature and Gaussian curvature. Geodesics. Gauss's Theorema Egregium.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) a score of 68% or higher in MATH 223 or (b) a score of 80% or higher in one of MATH 152, MATH 221; and either (a) a score of 68% or higher in MATH 227 or (b) a score of 80% or higher in one of MATH 217, MATH 254, MATH 264, MATH 317.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: West, Room: Mall
